p: MDS-UPDRS was used to score the level of PD symptoms. [ 41, 42] MDS-UPDRS Part III was scored while the subjects were in the “ON” state. All of the investigators were specialized in clinical neurology. Those without the “Certificate Exercise” for MDS-UPDRS training from the Movement Disorder Society ( https://www.movementdisorders.org/) underwent the MDS-UPDRS Training Program before the start of this study under the permission of the International Parkinson and Movement Disorder Society.
